scripts.build.dev: npm run prebuild && npm run high-memory-build -- build --configuration=dev
scripts.build.test: npm run prebuild && npm run high-memory-build -- build --configuration=test
scripts.build.rc: npm run prebuild && npm run high-memory-build -- build --configuration=rc
scripts.build.prod: npm run prebuild && npm run high-memory-build -- build --configuration=prod
scripts.build.ext01: npm run prebuild && npm run high-memory-build -- build --configuration=ext01
scripts.build.ext01-rc: npm run prebuild && npm run high-memory-build -- build --configuration=ext01-rc
scripts.build.ext01-dev: npm run prebuild && npm run high-memory-build -- build --configuration=ext01-dev
scripts.build.ext02: npm run prebuild && npm run high-memory-build -- build --configuration=ext02
scripts.build.ext02-rc: npm run prebuild && npm run high-memory-build -- build --configuration=ext02-rc
scripts.start.dev: npm run prebuild && npm run high-memory-build -- serve --port=3000 --configuration=dev-serve --proxy-config proxy/dev.proxy.json
scripts.start.test: npm run prebuild && npm run high-memory-build -- serve --port=3000 --configuration=test-serve --proxy-config proxy/test.proxy.json
scripts.start.rc: npm run prebuild && npm run high-memory-build -- serve --port=3000 --configuration=rc-serve --proxy-config proxy/rc.proxy.json
scripts.start.prod: npm run prebuild && npm run high-memory-build -- serve --port=3000 --configuration=prod-serve --proxy-config proxy/prod.proxy.json
scripts.start.ext01: npm run prebuild && npm run high-memory-build -- serve --port=80 --configuration=ext01-serve --proxy-config proxy/ext01.proxy.json
scripts.start.ext02: npm run prebuild && npm run high-memory-build -- serve --port=3000 --configuration=ext02-serve --proxy-config proxy/ext02-rc.proxy.json
scripts.start.ext02-rc: npm run prebuild && npm run high-memory-build -- serve --port=3000 --configuration=ext02-serve --proxy-config proxy/ext02-rc.proxy.json
scripts.start.local: npm run prebuild && npm run high-memory-build -- serve --port=3000 --configuration=local --proxy-config proxy/local.proxy.json
scripts.start.faster: npm run prebuild && npm run high-memory-build -- serve --port=3000 --configuration=dev-serve-faster --sourceMap=false --proxy-config proxy/dev.proxy.json
